current-chamber.#text:
IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED
		  STATES

official-title.#text:
To provide the Secretary of Transportation
		  with the flexibility to transfer certain funds to prevent reduced operations
		  and staffing of the Federal Aviation Administration, and for other
		  purposes.

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Authorization to transfer certain funds to
			 prevent reduced operations and staffing of the Federal Aviation
			 Administration

text.#text: The amount specified in this subsection is the amount, not to exceed $253,000,000, that the
